data.text: @torfaenplayserv Absolutely wonderful news and so well deserved!! Congratulations to the whole team on this fantastic achievement. We couldn’t have managed without you. You are all superstars and our heroes⭐️
@torfaenplayserv Don’t know what we would have done without you in our school hubs! Totally well deserved accolade! 👏👏🤩
@torfaenplayserv Thank you and well done, so well-deserved for all the fantastic work you do, for the difference you make and for the inspirational way you go about it 👏👏👏
@torfaenplayserv Diolch yn fawr for everything you’ve done!!
@torfaenplayserv So well deserved Julian, Andrea and team! You work so hard and your commitment during the pandemic has been amazing! Well done!
.we are a local authority that is only 16 miles long but we have so much to be proud of in Torfaen!!! #redarmy

packs to families, to those who created resources for home schooling, for those who helped with the refuge collection, helped with the delivery of free school meals, helped with the play and wellbeing camps..
